text: José Eduardo dos Santos (August 28, 1935 – July 8, 2022)W. Martin James and Susan Herlin Broadhead, Historical Dictionary of Angola (2004), Scarecrow Press, page 145. is an Angolan politician. From 1979 until 2017, he was the President of Angola. As President, dos Santos was also the commander in chief of the Angolan Armed Forces. After leaving the presidency, dos Santos remained leader of the People’s Movement for the Liberation of Angola (MPLA). Dos Santos died on July 8, 2022 at a hospital in Barcelona, Spain from cardiopulmonary arrest caused by cancer, aged 86. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiopulmonary arrest Category:Cancer deaths in Spain Category:Presidents of Angola Category:Former dictators
title: José Eduardo dos Santos
